description: High-level system overview documenting the core lottery prediction architecture, component interactions, and system boundaries
Detailed documentation of key prediction algorithms including quantum-inspired sampling, chaos theory modeling, and Fibonacci pattern analysis implementations
End-to-end data flow documentation covering crawling, processing, analysis pipeline and how data moves between prediction components
Technical details of the physical bias detection system including ball weight analysis, equipment monitoring, and environmental correlation algorithms
Documentation of the core statistical and ML models used for predictions, including their inputs, outputs, and how they work together in the unified predictor
